p: Interferon alpha-2a is a possible causative drug for peripheral neuropathy, sensory neuropathy, vasculitic neuropathy, Bell’s palsy, Guillain Barré Syndrome, chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy and autonomic polyneuropathy [ 40– 42]. Lopinavir/ritonavir is another possible causative drug for peripheral neuropathy [ 43]. Ribavirine is not associated with peripheral neuropathy [ 42].
